episodes.title: Tourist Trapped
episodes.plot: After finding a strange book in the forest, Dipper begins to learn about the dark side of Gravity Falls, and suspects that Mabel's new boyfriend is a zombie.

episodes.title: The Legend of the Gobblewonker
episodes.plot: Dipper and Mabel hear rumours that a sea monster lives at the bottom of the local lake, and enlist Soos to take them out on a boat to see if the monster really exists.

episodes.title: Headhunters
episodes.plot: The kids discover Stan's collection of wax sculptures, and Mabel decides to create her own. But when someone sabotages it, it's up to her and Dipper to solve the case.

episodes.title: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
episodes.plot: Dipper and Mabel meet an intriguing new neighbor: a psychotic child fraud named Li'l Gideon. When Gideon begins obsessing over Mabel and tries to win her over, Dipper tries to stop him.

episodes.title: The Inconveniencing
episodes.plot: Dipper tries to impress Wendy by going along with her and her friends to an abandoned convenience store that may be haunted.

episodes.title: Dipper vs. Manliness
episodes.plot: In order to become more manly, Dipper seeks the help of a gang of minotaurs in the forest. Meanwhile, Mabel gives Stan a makeover.

episodes.title: Double Dipper
episodes.plot: Stan throws a big party to promote the Mystery Shack, while Dipper uses a strange photocopier to make clones of himself, so that he can impress Wendy.

episodes.title: Irrational Treasure
episodes.plot: During Gravity Falls' Pioneer Day celebration, the kids attempt to uncover a conspiracy about the town's real founder.

episodes.title: The Time Traveler's Pig
episodes.plot: Dipper ruins a chance to impress Wendy at a fair, forcing him to use a time machine to travel back and stop it from happening.

episodes.title: Fight Fighters
episodes.plot: Dipper brings a video game character, Rumble McSkirmish, to life so he can fight Robbie, but when things go too far Dipper realizes he needs to save Robbie. Meanwhile, Mabel tries to end Stan's fear of heights.

episodes.title: Little Dipper
episodes.plot: Dipper finds a magic crystal with the ability to grow and shrink anything, but Gideon gets his hands on it and tries to get revenge on Stan and take the Mystery Shack.

episodes.title: Summerween
episodes.plot: It's Summerween, and Dipper and Mabel are visited by a monster called the Summerween Trickster, who informs them they must collect 500 pieces of candy, or be eaten.

episodes.title: Boss Mabel
episodes.plot: Mabel is in charge of the Mystery Shack after making a bet with Stan to see who can the most money in three days, and determine which of them is the better boss.

episodes.title: Bottomless Pit!
episodes.plot: Dipper, Mabel, Stan, and Soos accidentally fall into the Mystery Shack's bottomless pit and tell each other stories to pass the time.

episodes.title: The Deep End
episodes.plot: It's the hottest day of the Summer and the opening day of the Gravity Falls pool, where Mabel befriends a mysterious boy named Mermando.

episodes.title: Carpet Diem
episodes.plot: Dipper wants his own room and when Soos finds one in the shack, Stan makes Dipper and Mabel compete for it. Meanwhile, Dipper has found out that the shag rug inside let's you switch bodies with whomever you shock.

episodes.title: Boyz Crazy
episodes.plot: When Mabel Discovers that her favourite boy band is actually a bunch of imprisoned clones, she sets them free, only to decide on keeping them for herself; Dipper is convinced that Robbie plans to brainwash Wendy with a secret message.

episodes.title: Land Before Swine
episodes.plot: A dinosaur loose in Gravity Falls snatches up Mabel's pig, Waddles, leading the Pines family on a prehistoric journey to get him back.

episodes.title: Dreamscaperers
episodes.plot: Dipper, Mabel and Soos go through Stan's mind to defeat a tricky demon summoned by Lil Gideon.

episodes.title: Gideon Rises
episodes.plot: When Lil' Gideon takes over the Shack, Dipper and Mabel try to defeat him.
